description: A dessert with a crunchy base, tangy lemon centre and crackling topping.
keywords: Lemon pie & tart,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Delicious Tangy Lemon Meringue Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g pastry sheet, store bough and thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Roll out the pastry and place in a 9 inch baking dish covering the base and sides.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a mixer, beat the egg whites until soft peaks appear.
Inclemently add the sugar and cream of tartar keeping the peaks forming.
Remove the cake base from the oven and fill evenly with lemon curd. Now spread the meringue on top of the lemon.
Place back in the oven for a further 12 minutes or until the meringue starts to brown before serving.
